settings.heading: Our Factory Shop
settings.paragraph_1:
Stop by the Ina Paarman factory shop in Cape Town, to stock up on all your favourites at reduced prices.

Although our on-premises parking is limited, you’ll find plenty more along the safe, adjoining private road.

settings.description: Register for our newsletter to receive our favourite recipes straight to your inbox.

settings.factory_shop_description:
Unit B7  •  Diep River Industrial Park  •  Greenville Road  •  Diep River  •  Cape Town

Mon-Fri:  10:00 - 15:00  •  Sat:  09:00 - 13:00  •  Closed on Public Holidays

settings.about_quote: We are constantly improving our products. We never want to become complacent and feel we’ve arrived.
settings.about_text: Since day one, we’ve worked tirelessly to offer exceptional-quality products and ways to enhance people’s cooking experiences. Our promise to you is we’ll always recreate the goodness of home cooking in our high-tech production facility.
